titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of National Marina Day to honor America's marinas for their many contributions to their local communities and create awarness amongst citizens, policymakers, elected officials, and employees of the overall contributions of marinas to their well-being.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 7/24/2008--Introduced. Supports designation of National Marina Day (August 9, 2008) to honor the Nation's marinas.
